attributes.action: Liverpool - People Who Want To Cause Trouble
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My Petition Is To Make The Police Of Liverpool Realise That They Need More Police On Patrol Around The Gardens Area Because Today I Was In Liverpool And A Big Group Of 'Yobs' Came And Were Harrasing Us. I Am 15 And I Do Not Want To Be Hurt And I Dont Want Any Of My Friends To Be Hurt. Recently
There Has Been Stabbings In Liverpool I Think They Were Near The Gardens And People Think That This Group Of 'Yobs' Had Knives Today. So You Need To Make Liverpool Safer
Pleaaassseeeeeeeeee!!!
